name: Country Historical Evolution
description: Transform ancient maps into living 3D miniature countries with tilt-shift effect

visual_core.description: A tilt-shift, miniature landscape animation depicting the historical evolution of {country_name}. The scene transforms from a 2D {map_style} map into a fully rendered 3D miniature diorama, simulating rapid organic growth.
visual_core.style: 3D rendered miniature model, tilt-shift photography style, macro videography, textured ({texture_materials}), {cultural_style} atmosphere, pop-up book aesthetic.
visual_core.camera: Starts with a high-angle top-down shot of the map, then transitions quickly to a dynamic, slow-orbiting crane shot (macro perspective) that moves across the 3D {country_type} as elements grow.

timeline.action: An {map_color} {map_style} map of {country_name}, showing clear {map_texture} texture, unfolds rapidly to fill the frame.
Miniature models of {landmark_1} organically rise from the map. Simultaneously, {building_style} buildings emerge sequentially at an accelerated pace.
{water_feature} materializes as a glossy {water_color} ribbon. {boat_type} pop onto the water, and {vegetation} sprout rapidly along {vegetation_location}, following the map's green zones.

As the camera completes its orbit, {landmark_2} diffuses into view in the background, while bold 3D text '{country_display_name}' ({text_texture} texture) rises quickly from {text_location} to complete the diorama.

audio.music: {music_style} building quickly to a majestic crescendo.

metadata.lighting_description: Warm, golden, romantic lighting, simulating a late afternoon Mediterranean sun, casting soft, dramatic shadows and highlighting the stone and terracotta textures
metadata.color_palette: warm earth tones: terracotta red, marble white, stone grey, contrasted with the deep blue of the Tiber and the dark green of cypress trees
metadata.vegetation: miniature olive trees and tall cypresses
metadata.ambient_sounds: Subtle sounds of bustling city echoes, distant church bells, and gentle river flow
metadata.music_style: Classical, romantic orchestral music (featuring mandolin or classical guitar)

metadata.lighting_description: Warm, golden, dramatic lighting, simulating an early morning desert sun (low-key light source), casting long, soft shadows and highlighting the rich textures of the models
metadata.color_palette: desert tones: sand, sandstone, beige, contrasted with the deep blue of the Nile and the vibrant green of the oasis flora
metadata.landmark_1: the Great Pyramids and the Sphinx
metadata.ambient_sounds: Subtle sounds of shifting sand and light wind, accelerated organic growing sounds
metadata.music_style: Mystical, ambient orchestral music (featuring ney flute)

metadata.texture_materials: white marble, red sandstone, intricate pietra dura inlay
metadata.lighting_description: Bright, mystical, warm sunlight, simulating the vibrant, hazy heat of India. Light reflects brilliantly off the polished white marble surfaces
metadata.color_palette: brilliant white (marble), saffron yellow, deep greens, and rich sandstone red, contrasted with the blue of the river
metadata.landmark_1: the iconic Taj Mahal (white marble dome, four minarets)
metadata.landmark_2: a colorful miniature Rajasthani hill palace (like Hawa Mahal)
metadata.building_style: Mughal-style structures (red sandstone gates, intricate jali screens)
metadata.vegetation: miniature banyan and cypress trees (simulating a Charbagh garden)
metadata.text_location: the map surface near the Taj
metadata.ambient_sounds: Faint sounds of a bustling bazaar, distant sitar notes, gentle river flow, faint elephant calls
metadata.music_style: Mystical, rhythmic traditional Indian music (featuring sitar, tabla drums, and bansuri flute)

metadata.map_texture: showing sand dunes, desert trade routes, and constellations
metadata.texture_materials: white stucco, turquoise tile, polished gold
metadata.lighting_description: Mystical twilight lighting. The scene is lit by a large crescent moon and hundreds of glowing miniature lanterns hanging in the palace and trees, casting dramatic, long shadows
metadata.color_palette: deep desert blue (night sky) and sand tones, contrasted by the stark white of the buildings and glowing accents of turquoise and polished gold
metadata.landmark_1: a miniature, opulent Arabian palace (grand white domes, soaring minarets, pointed arches, and intricate turquoise tilework)
metadata.landmark_2: endless, rolling miniature sand dunes under a starry night sky
metadata.building_style: Arabian architecture (white domes, minarets, pointed arches)
metadata.water_feature: A vibrant blue oasis pool (with fountains)
metadata.vegetation: groves of miniature date palm trees
metadata.text_location: the desert sands on the map
metadata.ambient_sounds: Subtle sound of shifting sand, night crickets (cicadas), distant wind over dunes, and the gentle bubbling of oasis fountains
metadata.music_style: Mystical, enchanting, and sweeping Arabian orchestral music (featuring oud, ney flute, and goblet drums/darbuka)

metadata.lighting_description: Soft, romantic lighting simulating a Parisian sunset, casting golden hues and long shadows across Haussmanian boulevards
metadata.color_palette: cream limestone, grey zinc roofs, dark green gardens, contrasted with the Seine's deep blue
metadata.ambient_sounds: Subtle sounds of caf√© chatter, accordion music, and church bells

metadata.ambient_sounds: Subtle sounds of temple bells, train announcements, and city bustle
metadata.music_style: Modern orchestral with traditional Japanese instruments (koto, shamisen)
